alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:18PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elmore County through 800 PM MDT... At 718 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mountain Home, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mountain Home around 730 PM MDT. Tollgate around 750 PM MDT. Anderson Dam, Danskin Peak, Bennett Mountain and Little Camas Reservoir around 800 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
